Azerbaijan has been a geographical and cultural bridge between East and West for centuries where cultures and civilizations come together.
Representatives of all religions and ethnic groups in Azerbaijan have always lived in peace and tranquility.
The "Baku Process", launched in 2008, is a favorable platform for intercultural dialogue and is now a global initiative.
During the years of independence, Azerbaijan has been a reliable partner, pursuing an independent policy, development, security and (cont) https://t.co/wk8Pv8sekB

UN Security Council withdrawal of Armenian troops from the occupied Azerbaijani territories (cont.) Https://t.co/ovwLhRLGeD
Armenia ignores international organizations' decisions and resolutions, and no compulsion mechanism is applied to the occupying state.
Despite the fact of occupation, Azerbaijan has the highest economic growth rates in the world in 2004-2014.
The sharp decline in oil prices has not seriously affected the Azerbaijani economy, and the key targets will be achieved in 2016.
The political and economic initiatives put forward by Azerbaijan bring the states and peoples closer together.
